paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: The paper discusses the pathogenic TTR gene mutation c.148G>A (p.Val50Met) in patients diagnosed with hereditary transthyretin amyloid polyneuropathy (ATTRv-PN).

patients.demographics: 9 males, 1 female; mean age at TTR testing 68.2 years

individual_records.evidence_sentence: There were 10 patients with the heterozygous pathogenic c.148G>A (p.Val50Met) variant, and these ten patients were diagnosed with ATTRv-PN.

variants.evidence_level: Strong evidence based on clinical diagnosis.
variants.additional_notes: All patients with the variant were diagnosed with ATTRv-PN.
